title: Authorize Response
description: Response for authorize request, containing account information for the holder of the token.

authorize.description: Account information for the holder of the token.

loginid.description: The account ID that the token was issued for.

is_virtual.description: Flag indicating whether the account is virtual (1) or real (0).

msg_type.description: Action name of the request made.

req_id.description: Optional field sent in request to map to response, present only when request contains `req_id`.
